metadata.name: "Hold Tight to Splinters" by W.C. Richardson #1/1
metadata.description: This Nft is sold together with the physical artwork that inspired it. The physical painting by W.C. Richardson, is 31 x 31 inches, an oil and alkyd on canvas, painted in 2015. The provenance of the painting is directly from the artist's estate. Shipping for the physical artwork arranged separately.
